The library is compatible with Python 2.7 and 3.5.Installation------------.. code-block:: bash$ pip install genometoolsDemo Notebooks--------------- `Scripts.ipynb <docs/source/notebooks/Scripts.ipynb>`_: GenomeTools command-line scriptsDocumentation-------------The `GenomeTools Documentation`__ is available on ReadTheDocs.__ gtdocs_Copyright and License---------------------Copyright (c) 2015, 2016 Florian Wagner:: GenomeTools is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License, Version 3, as published by the Free Software Foundation.
